A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Surprisingly bad instalment.

Ignores pretty much everything that happened in the last film\, no progression there. Its own plot doesnt lead anywhere either\, luke was pointless\, rey and kylo go nowhere (still good girl v bad guy)\, too many plot holes to list\, extremely weak sub-plots that\, again\, go nowhere\, too long\, messy all round. Its like they cant find anything worthwhile for characters to do. Phasma? Why even giver her a name\, zero character. Rose? Who cares? Finn? No reason or believable motivation. Leia? What did she do again? So on and so forth.

There is pretty much no point in this and TFA existing\, as episode 9 has no buildup whatsoever now. With so much potential........what a waste. Amazingly ill-planned "trilogy". Zero interest in whatever inconsistent/poor story they comes next.
